overview: This page has strong content potential but several technical and on-page SEO issues that should be fixed.

checks.name: Title Tag
checks.recommendation: Add your primary keyword and keep the title under 60 characters.

checks.name: Meta Description
checks.recommendation: Write a compelling 140–160 character description that includes your primary keyword and a clear benefit.

checks.name: H1 Structure
checks.recommendation: You have a single, descriptive H1. Consider adding supporting H2s for better content structure.

checks.name: Canonical Tag
checks.recommendation: Add a canonical URL tag to prevent duplicate content issues.

checks.name: Content Depth
checks.recommendation: Increase the page to at least 800–1200 words of helpful, intent-matching content.

checks.name: Image Optimization
checks.recommendation: Compress large images, add descriptive ALT text, and use modern formats where possible.
